title: Hoero! Bun Bun
synopsis: Bunbun, an abandoned puppy meets the old Big, also a stray dog. Bunbun will learn to survive in an hostile and strange world.
staff: [["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Okamura, Tensai', ['Key Animation']], ['Ikeda, Yuuji', ['Background Art', ' Art Director']], ['Murano, Moribi', ['Original Creator']]]
